Adobe Flex properties files¶

New in version 1.8.

Adobe Flex applications use .properties files similar to Java properties, but with UTF-8 encoding, and therefore prop2po and po2prop are used for conversion.

We welcome more testing and feedback, but based on our solid support for properties, this probably works perfectly.
